name: Neopolitan | RWBY
description:
Resource used: https://civitai.com/models/22530

I will no longer be accepting any more requests, thank you for supporting my models!

Your characters may have insufficient training data! Click here.

Weight: 1.0

Trigger + Appearance: neopolitan, heterochromia, brown eyes, pink eyes

Default Outfit: white jacket, cropped jacket, black leotard, leotard under clothes, pants, belt

You may add bowler hat if you want, but I can't guarantee a perfect hat will come out.

If you're lucky, you can have her in just a leotard if you put something like (jacket, long sleeves, gloves:1.3) in the negative prompt. You may also remove her leotard under her jacket if you put (leotard:1.3) in the negative prompt.

There's also an experimental version which uses AI-generated images (given by the requester) of another Neopolitan model as part of the training dataset, so feel free to try that out if you want.

I've accumulated 343 responses, which is about double the last time I reported this number? It's actually a bit less than 343 because I haven't cleared the requests that I already fulfilled. I think I'll be giving Google Colab a break, I've hit the usage limit a couple times, so I'll be collecting and curating datasets in the meantime.

The results of your generations are dependent on the additional LoRAs, weights, and models you use, so it may not work or come out as consistent as my sample images. Other reasons may include me using xformers, token merging, and a modified DPM++ 2M Karras sampler.

modelVersions.name: v1.0-NoAI
modelVersions.description: Initial release. This version does not use AI-generated images as part of the training dataset.

meta.prompt: (masterpiece, best quality:1.2), <lora:rwby_neopolitan_noai-11:1>, cowboy shot, solo, 1girl, neopolitan, smile, closed mouth, looking at viewer, parasol, heterochromia, brown eyes, pink eyes, white cropped jacket, leotard under clothes, pants, belt
